√daṅś 'bite'

present: [1.] dáśati etc. V.+  dáśate etc. E.+   -- daṅśati  

perfect: dadaṅśus  dadaśvā́ṅs  

[aorist: daśyāt  adadaṅśat  adāṅkṣīt  ]

future: [1.] daśiṣyati  daṅkṣyati   -- [2.] daṅṣṭā  

verbal: daṣṭá AV.+  daṅṣṭvā  -daśya  

secondary: daṣyate etc.   -- intensive: dándaśāna  dandaśayitvā   -- desiderative: didaṅkṣa-   -- causative: daṅśayati etc. S.+  daṅśita E.+  

derivatives: daṅśa AV.+  daṅśaka C.  -daṅśin AV.  daṅśana E.+  dáṅśuka B.  daṅṣṭṛ́ AV.  dáṅṣṭra V.+  dáṅṣṭrā V.+  dáṅśman AV.S.  daṅkṣṇú B.  daśā? B.+  daśana E.+
